title: ROIT STOP
body: So im done with league you can't get in a game without a toxic player and can't have fun i have put so much money into this game and this is what it has turned into a a piece a crap they can't fix they should just give on league and stop updating the game i can't have fun in this game anymore you will play 10 game and have fun in 1 or 2 for a lack of better words the game is just fucked it takes 10 mins to get into a game that you loose and get pissed off by the end

replies.body: i agree riot should end league of legends because you don't enjoy playing

I went 16/4/9 last night and lost game...

Potatoes everywhere.
